label: StandardOrRegulation
comment: A standard (eg ISO 14000) or regulation (eg EU deforestation regulation) that specifies the criteria for conformance.

datatypeProperties.comment: The criteria associated with the standard or regulation.
The date of issue of the scheme.
The unique identifier of this conformity attestation
The issuing body of the conformity scheme.
The name of the conformity scheme (eg ACRS structural steel certification)
The type of criterion (optional or mandatory).

referencedBy.comment: The reference to the standard or regulation that defines the specification / criteria
